modName: Nail Polish for UNP and RaceMenu
summary: Adds overlays to RaceMenu for Fingernail and Toenail Polish
descriptionHtml:
Adds overlays to RaceMenu for Fingernail and Toenail Polish

Added a Loose file option to downloads since some people were having trouble with the archived version. If problems persist try installing the Loose Base Scripts for RaceMenu.

Tools Used:
[url=http://www.gimp.org]GIMP[/url]
[url=http://code.google.com/p/gimp-dds]GIMP DDS Plugin[/url]

Required Files:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu by expired6978[/url]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE[/url]
author: Rutah

files.name: Nail Polish for UNP Loose Files
files.fileName: Nail Polish for UNP Loose Files-49759-0-1.zip
